mapper.select: select tb_natres.*,tb_natpoint.nat_pointname,tb_user.user_name from tb_natres ,tb_natpoint ,tb_user where tb_natres.nat_pointid=tb_natpoint.nat_pointid and tb_natres.user_id=#{user_id} and tb_user.user_id=tb_natres.user_id and tb_natres.nat_result is not null order by tb_natres.nat_time desc
